article: on jan. # , #### , less than three weeks before mir aimal kansi is alleged to have fatally shot two cia employees outside the agency 's suburban virginia headquarters , a man in a raincoat carrying a rifle was spotted coming out of the woods near the vienna , va. , home of then-cia director robert m. gates .
